title: England midfielder Kirby announces international retirement after learning of Euro 2025 omission
description: Fran Kirby has announced her retirement from international football ahead of Women’s Euro 2025. The attacking midfielder has called time on her 11-year career with England, for whom she earned 77 caps and helped win the 2022 European Championship. Kirby, who was named in the Lionesses’ squad for their Nations League double-header against Portugal and […] The post England midfielder Kirby announces international retirement after learning of Euro 2025 omission appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Portugal boss Martinez thinks ´very little details´ will decide Germany clash
description: Roberto Martinez thinks “very little details” will be the difference when his Portugal side face Germany in the Nations League semi-finals on Wednesday. A Selecao das Quinas are back in the final four for the first time since winning the inaugural event in 2019, and aiming to become the tournament’s first multiple winners.
